definitions.definition: An instrument consisting of a tube containing mirrors and loose , colourful beads or other objects ; when the tube is looked into and rotated , a succession of symmetrical designs can be seen .
A constantly changing series of colours or other things .

main_definition: An instrument consisting of a tube containing mirrors and loose , colourful beads or other objects ; when the tube is looked into and rotated , a succession of symmetrical designs can be seen . [from 1817]
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) A constantly changing series of colours or other things .
